section.p: Adminstration of bodily fluids blood products etc.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] fluidType with data type Code
Identifies each the types of replacement fluids given intravascularly during the operative procedure.

Contains exactly one [1..1] quantity with data type Physical Quantity
Contains the gastric output (cc's) during the operative procedure

Contains at least one [1..*] typeFluid, where its type is Bodily Fluid Product
Identifies each the types of replacement fluids given intravascularly during the operative procedure.

Contains exactly one [1..1] fluidType with data type Code
Identifies each the types of replacement fluids given intravascularly during the operative procedure.

Contains exactly one [1..1] quantity with data type Physical Quantity
Contains the gastric output (cc's) during the operative procedure

Contains at least one [1..*] typeFluid, where its type is Bodily Fluid Product
Identifies each the types of replacement fluids given intravascularly during the operative procedure.
